body_html: @llchan With respect to libpng and other libraries embedded in _pywrap_tensorflow.so, look here. The linker scripts strictly control the symbols exported by _pywrap_tensorflow.so. Even though the library is loaded with RTLD_GLOBAL, only tensorflow related symbols are available in the global address space.
body_text: @llchan With respect to libpng and other libraries embedded in _pywrap_tensorflow.so, look here. The linker scripts strictly control the symbols exported by _pywrap_tensorflow.so. Even though the library is loaded with RTLD_GLOBAL, only tensorflow related symbols are available in the global address space.
body: @llchan With respect to libpng and other libraries embedded in `_pywrap_tensorflow.so`, look [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/9078909131d5e91e8bd1878eac54136885656043/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L651). The linker scripts strictly control the symbols exported by `_pywrap_tensorflow.so`. Even though the library is loaded with `RTLD_GLOBAL`, only tensorflow related symbols are available in the global address space.
